verses.verse: Unto the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> of <S%G2179>Ephesus<s%> <S%G1125>write<s%>; These <S%G3592>things<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> he that <S%G2902>holdeth<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G792>stars<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> right <S%G1188>hand<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G4043>walketh<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G3087>candlesticks<s%>;

I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2873>labour<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3754>how<s%> thou <S%G1410>canst<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G941>bear<s%> them which are <S%G2556>evil<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> thou hast <S%G3985>tried<s%> them which <S%G5335>say<s%> they <S%G1511>are<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> hast <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G5571>liars<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> hast <S%G941>borne<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2192>hast<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> name's <S%G1223>sake<s%> <S%G3686><s%> hast <S%G2872>laboured<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2577>hast<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2577>fainted<s%>.
<S%G235>Nevertheless<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> somewhat <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> thou hast <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G26>love<s%>.

<S%G3421>Remember<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> from <S%G4159>whence<s%> thou art <S%G1601>fallen<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3340>repent<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>; or <S%G1490>else<s%> I will <S%G2064>come<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G5035>quickly<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> will <S%G2795>remove<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3087>candlestick<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%>, <S%G3362>except<s%> thou <S%G3340>repent<s%>.

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> thou <S%G2192>hast<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> thou <S%G3404>hatest<s%> the <S%G2041>deeds<s%> of the <S%G3531>Nicolaitans<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2504>also<s%> <S%G3404>hate<s%>.

He that <S%G2192>hath<s%> an <S%G3775>ear<s%>, let him <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto the <S%G1577>churches<s%>; To <S%G846>him<s%> that <S%G3528>overcometh<s%> will I <S%G1325>give<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3586>tree<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of the <S%G3857>paradise<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> unto the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> in <S%G4668>Smyrna<s%> <S%G1125>write<s%>; These <S%G3592>things<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> is <S%G2198>alive<s%>;

I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4432>poverty<s%>, <S%G1161>(but<s%> thou <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G4145>rich<s%>) <S%G2532>and<s%> I know the <S%G988>blasphemy<s%> of them <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G1438>they<s%> <S%G1511>are<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> are the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> of <S%G4567>Satan<s%>.

<S%G5399>Fear<s%> <S%G3367>none<s%> of those things <S%G3739>which<s%> thou <S%G3195>shalt<s%> <S%G3958>suffer<s%>: <S%G2400>behold<s%>, the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G3195>shall<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> some <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5438>prison<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> ye may be <S%G3985>tried<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> ye shall <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>: be <S%G1096>thou<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G891>unto<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> I will <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> a <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%>.

He that <S%G2192>hath<s%> an <S%G3775>ear<s%>, let him <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto the <S%G1577>churches<s%>; He that <S%G3528>overcometh<s%> <S%G91>shall<s%> <S%G3364>not<s%> be <S%G91>hurt<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> to the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4010>Pergamos<s%> <S%G1125>write<s%>; These <S%G3592>things<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> he which <S%G2192>hath<s%> the <S%G3691>sharp<s%> <S%G4501>sword<s%> with two <S%G1366>edges<s%>;

I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> thou <S%G2730>dwellest<s%>, even <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G4567>Satan's<s%> <S%G2362>seat<s%> is: <S%G2532>and<s%> thou holdest <S%G2902>fast<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G720>hast<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G720>denied<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> those <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G1722>wherein<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G493>Antipas<s%> was <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G3144>martyr<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> was <S%G615>slain<s%> <S%G3844>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G2730>dwelleth<s%>.

<S%G235>But<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> a few <S%G3641>things<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> thou <S%G2192>hast<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> them that <S%G2902>hold<s%> the <S%G1322>doctrine<s%> of <S%G903>Balaam<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G1722>taught<s%> <S%G1321><s%> <S%G904>Balac<s%> to <S%G906>cast<s%> a <S%G4625>stumblingblock<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%>, to <S%G5315>eat<s%> things sacrificed unto <S%G1494>idols<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to commit <S%G4203>fornication<s%>.

<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G2192>hast<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> them that <S%G2902>hold<s%> the <S%G1322>doctrine<s%> of the <S%G3531>Nicolaitans<s%>, which <S%G3739>thing<s%> I <S%G3404>hate<s%>.

<S%G3340>Repent<s%>; or <S%G1490>else<s%> I will <S%G2064>come<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G5035>quickly<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> will <S%G4170>fight<s%> <S%G3326>against<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G4501>sword<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%>.

He that <S%G2192>hath<s%> an <S%G3775>ear<s%>, let him <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto the <S%G1577>churches<s%>; To <S%G846>him<s%> that <S%G3528>overcometh<s%> will I <S%G1325>give<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G2928>hidden<s%> <S%G3131>manna<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> will <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G5586>stone<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G5586>stone<s%> a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1097>knoweth<s%> <S%G1508>saving<s%> he that <S%G2983>receiveth<s%> it.

<S%G2532>And<s%> unto the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2363>Thyatira<s%> <S%G1125>write<s%>; These <S%G3592>things<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> unto a <S%G5395>flame<s%> of <S%G4442>fire<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> are <S%G3664>like<s%> fine <S%G5474>brass<s%>;

I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G26>charity<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1248>service<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%> to be more <S%G4119>than<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%>.

<S%G235>Notwithstanding<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> a few <S%G3641>things<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> thou <S%G1439>sufferest<s%> that <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2403>Jezebel<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3004>calleth<s%> <S%G1438>herself<s%> a <S%G4398>prophetess<s%>, to <S%G1321>teach<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G4105>seduce<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> to commit <S%G4203>fornication<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> things sacrificed unto <S%G1494>idols<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5550>space<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G3340>repent<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G4202>fornication<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> she <S%G3340>repented<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>.

<S%G2400>Behold<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> will <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G2825>bed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> them that commit <S%G3431>adultery<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation<s%>, <S%G3362>except<s%> they <S%G3340>repent<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2041>deeds<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> I will <S%G615>kill<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1577>churches<s%> shall <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> he <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2045>searcheth<s%> the <S%G3510>reins<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> I will <S%G1325>give<s%> unto every <S%G1538>one<s%> of <S%G5213>you<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> unto the <S%G3062>rest<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2363>Thyatira<s%>, as many <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1322>doctrine<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G1097>have<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1097>known<s%> the <S%G899>depths<s%> of <S%G4567>Satan<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> they <S%G3004>speak<s%>; I will <S%G906>put<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3756>none<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G922>burden<s%>.
<S%G4133>But<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> ye <S%G2192>have<s%> already hold <S%G2902>fast<s%> <S%G891>till<s%> <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G302>come<s%> <S%G2240><s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he that <S%G3528>overcometh<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5083>keepeth<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G891>unto<s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%>, to <S%G846>him<s%> will I <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> he shall <S%G4165>rule<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> a <S%G4464>rod<s%> of <S%G4603>iron<s%>; <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G4632>vessels<s%> of a <S%G2764>potter<s%> shall they be broken to <S%G4937>shivers<s%>: <S%G2504>even<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2504>I<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> I will <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> the <S%G4407>morning<s%> <S%G792>star<s%>.
He that <S%G2192>hath<s%> an <S%G3775>ear<s%>, let him <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto the <S%G1577>churches<s%>.
